mapper.update: update t_product pr JOIN t_product_payment pp ON pp.iproduct = pr.iproduct JOIN t_payment pa ON pa.ipayment = pp.ipayment set pa.istatus = 1 WHERE pa.ipayment = #{ipayment};
update t_review r JOIN t_payment p ON r.ipayment = p.ipayment SET r.contents = null , r.rating = null WHERE r.ireview = #{ireview} AND p.istatus = #{istatus}
mapper.select: SELECT u.iuser FROM t_user u JOIN t_product p ON p.iuser = u.iuser JOIN t_product_payment pp ON pp.iproduct = p.iproduct JOIN t_review r on pp.ipayment = r.ipayment WHERE r.ireview = #{ireview}

SELECT r.rating as totalRat, u.rating as averageRat, COUNT(u.iuser) as countIuser FROM t_user u JOIN t_product p ON p.iuser = u.iuser JOIN t_product_payment pp ON pp.iproduct = p.iproduct JOIN t_review r on pp.ipayment = r.ipayment WHERE u.iuser = #{iuser}
